body_html:
There's no simple answer to these questions. But there should be many papers and blog posts about the general topics of SGD training and hyperparameter tuning.

If you're really a beginner, you should try playing with http://playground.tensorflow.org/
body_text:
There's no simple answer to these questions.  But there should be many papers and blog posts about the general topics of SGD training and hyperparameter tuning.
If you're really a beginner, you should try playing with http://playground.tensorflow.org/
body:
There's no simple answer to these questions.  But there should be many papers and blog posts about the general topics of SGD training and hyperparameter tuning.

If you're really a beginner, you should try playing with http://playground.tensorflow.org/
